author: Colin and Samir
description:
Very surreal to have Adobe support our vision for Press Publish NYC.

Downloading Premiere Pro changed our lives forever—and now Premiere is available on iPhone. We partnered with Adobe to host a session on the future of storytelling, where they gave everyone in the room early access.

Here’s a quick recap of that panel and the ideas that came out of it.
title: We threw a party for the internet
